name: Crayon Face
description:
The crayon world is so full of color, every color under the rainbow from “Flamingo Pink” to “Unmellow Yellow” you’d think everyone got to enjoy the vast joy of the crayola colors.

Not so for Crayon Face. He was born with a color deficiency. From head to blob he was just an outline. Until one day, he ran into the most beautiful creature he’d ever seen.

To his surprise, she blew him an ever-so-soft kiss. No one, had given Crayon Face this kind of attention before. Embarrassed, he ran away for he was certain no one would want to love a colorless Crayon man.

Courage struck him suddenly when he decided to embark on his journey to get color. Braving impossible odds, he was going to find the legendary Crayons used by the Crayon people’s ancestors to give himself color.  Nothing was going to stop him, and he was going to be colorful enough to find love in Crayon World.
